product_name: Pepper's Four Thirty Three Polarized Sunglasses - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Blustery winds or glaring sun, the sporty Pepper's Four Thirty Three polarized sunglasses keep out the elements so you can be at your best. Grilamid(TM) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures, and are extremely impact resistant. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shiny black frames feature polarized smoke (gray) lenses; shiny dark tortoise frames feature brown polarized lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: Blustery winds or glaring sun, the sporty Pepper's Four Thirty Three polarized sunglasses keep out the elements so you can be at your best.
